Title: 6 Essential Ingredients for Effective Strategic Planning
Description:
It's that time of year again. The weather is changing, leaves are falling off the trees, and your favorite leadership podcast is talking about Strategic Planning again.

If there’s one thing that humans do well, it’s imagining the future. (We can do it badly, too, of course.) But the important thing is that we can create better outcomes for ourselves and our businesses when we do it intentionally. That's where Strategic Planning comes in.

We recently hosted our second annual Strategic Design workshop and the insights and breakthroughs were game-changing. We can't wait to see what our clients do in the new year!

Today, Michael and Megan help you plan for success in 2023 by offering you 6 essential ingredients for an effective strategic plan.

In this episode, you will learn:

  • How to survey your employees to better serve them
  • Which financial data you'll need heading into the new year
  • Which stakeholders need to be talked to and considered during this process
  • The importance of both vision and values


Remember that we're offering a special discount on our On-Demand Strategic Design Workshop, but you gotta act fast! Visit leadto.win/strategicplan.
